summary: This document is an internal email correspondence from Deutsche Bank regarding ISDAs related to Jeffrey Epstein. It includes communication between Tazia Smith, Paul Morris, Caroline Kitidis, and Amanda Kirby, discussing the progress of drafts and coordination with other individuals.
